aliquotVariables.title: Gene ID encoding systme
aliquotVariables.description: Gene ID encoding system used for returned gene IDs

aliquotVariables.title: Type of gene list requested
aliquotVariables.description: Type of gene list provided by user, 'all'=return all genes, 'intersection'=return only genes represented in all observed aliquots, 'specific'=only return genes on the optional 'FUSE:geneList'

aliquotVariables.title: List of gene IDs to return
aliquotVariables.description: List of gene IDs requested, ignored if 'FUSE:geneListType'!='specific'; list uses ID encoding system specified by 'FUSE:system'.
